item.runics.ansuz_rune.tooltip: Befriends animals and prevents their attacks.
item.runics.raidho_rune.tooltip: Grants speed and reduced hunger drain while moving.

item.runics.algiz_inverted_rune.tooltip: Grants invisibility after sneaking for 10 seconds.

item.runics.mob_capsule.tooltip: Capture mobs with low health and release them elsewhere.
